all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
In the sweat of thy face shalt thou eat bread, till thou return unto the ground; for out of it wast thou taken: for dust thou art, and unto dust shalt thou return.
Genesis 3:19
Quote of the Day
"The Lord proves us … to strengthen us. That proving … comes in moments when we feel stretched beyond what we thought we could bear."
President Henry B. Eyring | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
